item.title: Ansible: Deploy VMs With PXE and Kickstart
item.description: I’ve completed my basic workflow for for generating a PXE boot environment and deploying VMs. This builds on a few of my previous posts, so I will be omitting some steps. See the relevant git commit here. Overview The workflow is a collection of roles. Currently, I’m calling them on an ad hoc basis, but they’re designed to ultimately be called from a single playbook. local-repo This is the role for configuring my local repository, which included a preparatory script on the container host.
